profile.name: Salvado
profile.about: Crafting high-performance web applications and scalable digital solutions with a focus on clean architecture and exceptional user experience.

projects.title: YARA Malware Detection Rules
projects.description: A collection of YARA rules for identifying and detecting malware patterns using YARAâ€™s rule-based scanning syntax. The repository contains custom `.yar` signatures aimed at improving threat detection and malware analysis workflows.

projects.title: HomeService
projects.description: HomeService is a web-based platform built with Python and Flask to manage household service bookings, hosted on Microsoft Azure with a MySQL database.

projects.title: Library Book Borrowing System
projects.description: A web-based library management and book borrowing application built with Flask and MySQL, featuring user authentication, book search, borrowing/returning functions, and admin book management.

projects.title: Flappy Bird Game (Python)
projects.description: A Python-based implementation of the classic Flappy Bird game, featuring game logic and assets to recreate the addictive side-scrolling bird gameplay in a desktop environment.

services.title: Web Application Development
services.desc: Building fast, responsive, and robust web applications from scratch.

services.title: Cyber security (Penetration Testing)
services.desc: Conducting advanced penetration testing and uncovering vulnerabilities across modern digital infrastructures.
